EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Survival is not Mandatory Josh Long_Charlotte_Q317.Charlotte Post
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us in Charlotte
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Sorry we missed you at the Survival is not Mandatory: Cloud-Native Java event with Josh Long in Minneapolis. We would love for you to join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> to experience more talks by Josh and other Spring advocates. Please use one of our discount codes below to save an additional $200 off the full conference pass price.
- S1P200_Hoffacker: Contact Matthew Nelson (mnelson@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mnelson@pivotal.io]]>) - S1P200_MNelson: Contact Michael Hoffacker (mhoffacker@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mhoffacker@pivotal.io]]>) - S1P200_Iverson: Contact David Iverson (diverson@pivotal.io <[[mailto:diverson@pivotal.io]]>)
If you are interested in having Pivotal present Spring content to your organization or want to learn more about Pivotal please contact me at mnelson@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mnelson@pivotal.io]]> to schedule a meeting with our team. Thank you again for joining us! The Pivotal Team
